name: Laura Skirt
description: This simple little skirt has an elastic waist band and a gathered skirt so can easily be dressed up or down. These skirts are all lovingly handmade in my home studio from recycled and vintage fabrics. To choose your fabric go to View Fabric and send me a message with your choice. You can email me here theresa@rummagestyle.com or just leave a message when you pay with Paypal. *Please note that the fabric in the photo has been sold. **Often there is only enough of any given fabric to make one garment. In the event of two people ordering the same fabric in a short period of time then it will be a first in best dressed policy. Sizing; Please note - if you need help with measurements just ask and If your size isn't there don't worry, I'll cut a pattern to your measurements! The total length of the skirt is 55cm for all sizes but this can easily be changed - just let me know how much longer or shorter you would like it when you tell me your fabric choice. Size 8 - Waist 67-72cm Size 10 - Waist 73-77cm Size 12 - Waist 78-82cm Size 14 - Waist 83-88cm Size 16 - Waist 88-93cm Size 18 - Waist 94-99cm

name: Shift Dress with Pockets - choose your own vintage fabric
Scarlett Dress - choose your own vintage fabric from our stash!
description: Cute Dress! Each one has a lined bodice with a contrasting fabric lining. An easy fit dress with waist ties that wrap the dress around to fit. The ties can be tied at the back or brought around to tie at the front or side. These dresses are all lovingly handmade in my home studio from recycled and vintage fabrics. To choose your fabric go to View Fabric and send me a message with your choice. You can email me here theresa@rummagestyle.com or just leave a message when you pay with Paypal. *Please note that the fabric in the photo has been sold. **Often there is only enough of any given fabric to make one garment. In the event of two people ordering the same fabric in a short period of time then it will be a first in best dressed policy. Sizing; Please note - if you are between sizes on the bust measurement just order the size at the lower end and then leave me your bust measurement with your fabric choice and I will adjust the dress to fit you! If your size isn't there don't worry, I'll cut a pattern to your measurements! Size 8; Bust - 80-84cm, Waist - ties in from from 56 to 92cm, Length - 86cm (waist measured at 36cm from top of shoulder) Size 10; Bust - 85-88cm, Waist - ties in from from 60 to 96cm, Length - 87cm (waist measured at 36cm from top of shoulder) Size 12; Bust - 89-94cm, Waist - ties in from from 64 to 100cm, Length - 89cm (waist measured at 39cm from top of shoulder) Size 14; Bust - 95-100cm, Waist - ties in from 68 to 108cm, Length - 90cm (waist measured at 42cm from top of shoulder) Size 16; Bust - 107-112cm, Waist - ties in from 72 to 118cm, Length - 91cm (waist measured at 42cm from top of shoulder) Size 18; Bust - 115-120cm, Waist - ties in from 88 to 128cm, Length - 91cm (waist measured at 44cm from top of shoulder) The length of the dress can be made longer or shorter. If you would like to change the length please let me know when notifying me of fabric choice. If you want pockets added to your dress choose the pocket option and add to your shopping cart. Please allow up to 4 weeks for arrival of custom made orders.

name: Shorts with Contrasting Pockets
description: These shorts are all lovingly handmade in my home studio from recycled and vintage fabrics. To choose your fabric go to View Fabric and send me a message with your choice. You can email me here theresa@rummagestyle.com or just leave a message when you pay with Paypal. You will need to choose a fabric for the shorts and also a contrasting fabric for the pockets. I can also do it all in the same fabric if you like. *Please note that the fabric in the photo has been sold. **Often there is only enough of any given fabric to make one garment. In the event of two people ordering the same fabric in a short period of time then it will be a first in best dressed policy. Sizing - Extra Small - Waist 56-78cm Hip 90cm Small - Waist 62-84cm Hip 98cm Medium - Waist 68-90cm Hip 106cm Large - Waist 74-96cm Hip 114cm Extra Large - Waist 80-102cm Hip 122cm

name: Messenger Dress - choose your own vintage fabric from my stash!
description: Do you like jumbo pockets on your dresses? Cute dress with oversized pockets! A loose waisted dress that can also be belted for a more fitted look. Please allow up to 4 weeks for arrival of custom made orders. FABRICS These dresses are all lovingly handmade in my home studio from recycled and vintage fabrics. To choose your fabric go to View Fabric and send me a message with your choice. You can email me here theresa@rummagestyle.com or just leave a message when you pay with Paypal. *Please note that the fabric in the photo has been sold. **Often there is only enough of any given fabric to make one garment. In the event of two people ordering the same fabric in a short period of time then it will be a first in best dressed policy. SIZING * If you are between sizes or just a centremetre or so over a size just let me know and I'll adjust one to fit you. If your size isn't there let me know! **When measuring the total length make sure you measure down the front of your body over your bust from the top of your shoulder to the hem. If you would like the length adjusted just let me know! ***Waist measurement is taken about 4cm above your belly button Size 8 Bust - 86cm, Waist - up to 94cm, Hip - 146cm, Total Length - 89cm Size 10 Bust - 92cm, Waist - up to 96cm, Hip - 148cm, Total Length - 89cm Size 12 Bust - 98cm, Waist - 104cm, Hip - 154cm, Total Length - 94cm Size 14 Bust - 104cm, Waist - up to 112cm, Hip - 160cm, Total Length - 96cm Size 16 Bust - 116cm, Waist - up to 120cm, Hip - 170cm, Total Length - 97cm Size 18 Bust - 128cm, Waist - up to 132cm, Hip - 180cm, Total Length - 98cm
